ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Funny story
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, When someone gets summoned, I generally /ooc Evade him!  Use Tactics! But then from time to time it does happen to all of us:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh,

When someone gets summoned, I generally /ooc Evade him! Use Tactics!

But then from time to time it does happen to all of us:

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/vox_sylly1.jpg

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/vox_sylly2.jpg

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 9:35 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Funny story


Was in Charkok last night for the first time ever and a Sarnak Abjugator or
whatever showed up.
[snippage]
Just thought I'd share. Was a funny moment for me (though scary! I
generally stay low on hate lists (ancient Lyrnia Secret) so I've never
gotten summoned before)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2
